title: Multilingual Speech Synthesis
description: I developed a speech-to-speech synthesis system that converts English audio into any of 17 different languages while preserving the original voice characteristics. The system utilizes Whisper for highly accurate speech-to-text conversion with 95% translation accuracy. The translated text is then processed using Coqui TTS to regenerate audio, maintaining the original tone and intonation. The system is capable of processing up to 50 audio files per hour, making it both fast and efficient.

title: Meal Tracker and Recommendation System
description: I created a web application that helps users maintain a healthy diet by logging meals and receiving personalized AI-driven meal recommendations. The frontend, built with React and Bootstrap, offers a seamless user experience with sub-200ms response times. The backend, powered by Node.js and Express, efficiently handles thousands of meal entries and user authentication. MongoDB is used for fast data storage and retrieval, while machine learning models developed in Python and TensorFlow analyze meal patterns, achieving 85% recommendation accuracy.

title: Grocery List App with Balance Tracker
description: This web app allows users to manage a grocery list in real-time and track their balance for EBT or any other card. Users can log and delete transactions to maintain an updated balance. The app's information is stored in a Firebase Database and displayed in an organized interface. This ensures that users can efficiently manage their groceries and finances in one place, offering a streamlined experience.

title: Image Processing Kernels
description: I developed image processing algorithms in MIPS Assembly, including thresholding for image analysis and affine transformations for rotations and shears. Additionally, I implemented cryptographic text blurring using transposition ciphering to enhance data security in image processing. These optimizations led to improved efficiency in image segmentation and transformation, boosting processing speed and accuracy by up to 30%.

title: Kirby Game
description: I built a 2D platform game inspired by the classic Kirby, using TypeScript and the Kaboom.js library. The game features a custom level/map constructed with Tiled. Players can jump using the X key and use special abilities with the Z key. The game recreates the nostalgic feel of Kirby with modern development tools, making it both fun and technically interesting.

title: Movie Database
description: I developed a web app that accesses a database of movies through the OMDb API, allowing users to search for films and view detailed information. Users can see movie descriptions, ratings, and film posters in an easy-to-navigate interface. This project showcases my ability to integrate third-party APIs and create user-friendly, data-driven applications.

title: Man City Chrome Extension
description: I created a Chrome extension that lets users quickly check the results of recent Manchester City matches. The extension fetches data from API-SPORTS using JavaScript and presents it in a clean, Bootstrap-based layout. Though not available in the Chrome Web Store, the extension provides a convenient and efficient way for fans to stay updated on their team's performance.
